TopicTitle: AppLauncher window showing data from active thermometers (and other instruments)

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody

I would love to use a mod that would show temperatures from multiple activated thermometers without having to keep their context menu open. Honestly i don't know if those numbers are available while that window is not visible

Would be nice if it could show other similar instruments - pressure (redundant, as its just under altimeter, i know), gravity scan and seismic. But those are not that useful

Awesome bonus would be if it could highlight relevant thermometer on mouse hover

I searched on curse and forums without any luck finding something that could do just that, if you know about any, please let me know. I even started looking into writing it myself, but lack of free time to even play games makes it difficult
I think NanoGauges has most of these?

Very nice mod, but i have issue with it:

Temp worked only until i jettisoned few sensors, after that temp gauge stayed offline (red rectangle in top part of gauge) like it was missing temp sensors, even if i still had few other thermometers left. Not even restarting game or deleting nanogauges.dat helped

And it averages all the temperatures it finds (not that big issue )
